title: Now Hiring: YouTube Voice Over Artist (Remote | $220/month)
job_overview:
Pay: $55/week ($220/month)
Location: Remote / Work-from-home
Type: Part-Time / Contract

Your Voice. Our Vision. Millions of Views.
We’re on the hunt for a dynamic Voice Over Artist to bring our YouTube content to life. If you have a strong, engaging, and clear voice that commands attention — and you love telling stories that matter — then this role is for you.

What You’ll Be Doing
Record 5 short audio narrations per week (typically 5–10 minutes each)

Voice news-style scripts with a professional, dramatic, or authoritative tone (depending on content)

Match delivery to the emotional tone and pacing of the video

Submit clean, high-quality audio (minimal background noise or distortion)

Communicate and collaborate with our video production team to meet weekly delivery deadlines

Requirements
A clear, articulate, and expressive voice suited for news, commentary, or documentary narration

Prior experience with voice acting, podcasting, or narration (YouTube samples a plus)

Ability to record from a quiet space with quality mic and editing tools (e.g., Audacity, Adobe Audition)

Strong communication and fast turnaround times (24–48 hours preferred)

Bonus: Ability to take direction and deliver alternate takes when needed

What We Offer
$55/week — paid monthly ($220/month)

Flexible remote schedule

Scripts provided — no writing required

Long-term opportunity for a growing channel

Regular, consistent work with a collaborative creative team
